name: Blorbo the Cat
description:
Blorbo is an adventure all about speed. Inspired by classic bomberman, blow and seek a way through forests and caves, take down creepy ghosts and all while moving as fast as you can!

The game project was created by our lovely team Bluescreen:

Jaeryeong Choe - Artist

Hannes Karttunen - Artist

Eetu Vartiainen - Artist 

Teemu Herrala - Programmer

Jesse Vuorela - Programmer

Inka Harilainen - Programmer
